Volatility also may be defined as a probability-weighted measure of the dispersion of returns about the mean. The volatility of a share price is the standard deviation of the continuously compounded rates of return on the share over a specified period. That is the same as the standard deviation of the differences in the natural logarithms of the stock prices plus dividends, if any, over the period.
role.label: Volatility rate

role.documentation: The risk-free interest rate assumption that is used in valuing an option on its own shares.
role.label: Risk free interest rate minimum

role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.
role.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award [Line Items]

role.documentation: Number of shares authorized for issuance under share-based payment arrangement.
role.label: Maximum shares allowed under plan

role.documentation: The number of shares into which fully or partially vested stock options outstanding as of the balance sheet date can be currently converted under the option plan.
role.label: Options exercisable

role.documentation: The weighted-average price as of the balance sheet date at which grantees can acquire the shares reserved for issuance on vested portions of options outstanding and currently exercisable under the stock option plan.
role.label: Weighted average exercise price, options exercisable

role.documentation: Number of options or other stock instruments for which the right to exercise has lapsed under the terms of the plan agreements.
role.label: Options cancelled or expired

role.documentation: Net number of share options (or share units) granted during the period.
role.label: Options granted

role.documentation: Amount by which the current fair value of the underlying stock exceeds the exercise price of options outstanding.
role.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Intrinsic Value

role.documentation: Number of options outstanding, including both vested and non-vested options.
role.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Number

role.documentation: Weighted average price at which grantees can acquire the shares reserved for issuance under the stock option plan.
role.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Weighted Average Exercise Price
role.periodEndLabel: Weighted average exercise price, options outstanding, ending balance
role.periodStartLabel: Weighted average exercise price, options outstanding, beginning balance

role.documentation: Award under share-based payment arrangement.
Weighted average price at which option holders acquired shares when converting their stock options into shares.
role.label: Weighted average exercise price, options exercised

role.documentation: Weighted average price at which grantees could have acquired the underlying shares with respect to stock options of the plan that expired.
role.label: Weighted average exercise price, options cancelled or expired

role.documentation: Weighted average per share amount at which grantees can acquire shares of common stock by exercise of options.
role.label: Weighted average exercise price, options granted

role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy for award under share-based payment arrangement. Includes, but is not limited to, methodology and assumption used in measuring cost.
role.label: Stock-Based Compensation

role.documentation: Expected term of award under share-based payment arrangement, in 'PnYnMnDTnHnMnS' format, for example, 'P1Y5M13D' represents reported fact of one year, five months, and thirteen days.
role.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Expected Term

role.documentation: Weighted average remaining contractual term for option awards outstanding, in 'PnYnMnDTnHnMnS' format, for example, 'P1Y5M13D' represents the reported fact of one year, five months, and thirteen days.
role.label: Weighted average remaining contractual life, options outstanding

role.documentation: Weighted average remaining contractual term of exercisable stock options, in 'PnYnMnDTnHnMnS' format, for example, 'P1Y5M13D' represents the reported fact of one year, five months, and thirteen days.
role.label: Weighted average remaining contractual life, options exercisable

role.documentation: Number of shares issued which are neither cancelled nor held in the treasury.
role.label: Shares, Outstanding

role.documentation: The entire disclosure for all significant accounting policies of the reporting entity.
role.label: SUMMARY OF SIGNIFICANT ACCOUNTING POLICIES

role.documentation: Internally developed software for sale, licensing or long-term internal use.
role.label: Software Development [Member]

role.documentation: Information by business segments.
role.label: Segments [Axis]

role.documentation: Information by component of equity.
role.label: Equity Components [Axis]

role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.
role.label: Statement [Line Items]

role.documentation: Schedule reflecting a Statement of Income, Statement of Cash Flows, Statement of Financial Position, Statement of Shareholders' Equity and Other Comprehensive Income, or other statement as needed.
role.label: Statement [Table]

role.documentation: Number of shares of stock issued during the period pursuant to acquisitions.
role.label: Forta acquisition, Shares
role.verboseLabel: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Acquisitions

role.documentation: Number of shares issued in lieu of cash for services contributed to the entity. Number of shares includes, but is not limited to, shares issued for services contributed by vendors and founders.
role.label: Stock issued in exchange for services, Shares

role.documentation: Number of new stock issued during the period.
role.label: Private Placement stock issue, shares

role.documentation: Number of share options (or share units) exercised during the current period.
role.label: Stock options exercised, shares

role.documentation: Value of stock issued pursuant to acquisitions during the period.
role.label: Forta acquisition

role.documentation: Value of stock issued in lieu of cash for services contributed to the entity. Value of the stock issued includes, but is not limited to, services contributed by vendors and founders.
role.label: Stock issued in exchange for services

role.documentation: Equity impact of the value of new stock issued during the period. Includes shares issued in an initial public offering or a secondary public offering.
role.label: Private Placement stock issue

role.documentation: Value, before forfeiture, of shares issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).
role.label: Stock based employee compensation expense

role.documentation: Value of stock issued as a result of the exercise of stock options.
role.label: Stock options exercised

role.documentation: Contracts conveying rights, but not obligations, to buy or sell a specific quantity of stock at a specified price during a specified period (an American option) or at a specified date (a European option).
role.label: Equity Option [Member]

role.documentation: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which are attributable to the parent. The amount of the economic entity's stockholders' equity attributable to the parent excludes the amount of stockholders' equity which is allocable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest). This excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.
role.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Parent

role.documentation: The entire disclosure for shareholders' equity comprised of portions attributable to the parent entity and noncontrolling interest, including other comprehensive income. Includes, but is not limited to, balances of common stock, preferred stock, additional paid-in capital, other capital and retained earnings, accumulated balance for each classification of other comprehensive income and amount of comprehensive income.
role.label: Stockholders' Equity Note Disclosure [Text Block]

role.documentation: The entire disclosure for significant events or transactions that occurred after the balance sheet date through the date the financial statements were issued or the date the financial statements were available to be issued. Examples include: the sale of a capital stock issue, purchase of a business, settlement of litigation, catastrophic loss, significant foreign exchange rate changes, loans to insiders or affiliates, and transactions not in the ordinary course of business.
role.label: SUBSEQUENT EVENTS

role.documentation: Different names of stock transactions and the different attributes of each transaction.
role.label: Subsidiary or Equity Method Investee, Sale of Stock by Subsidiary or Equity Investee [Table]

role.documentation: Information by type of sale of the entity's stock.
role.label: Sale of Stock [Axis]

role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.
role.label: Subsidiary, Sale of Stock [Line Items]
Supplemental disclosures of cash flow information:

role.documentation: Rights acquired through registration of a trademark to gain or protect exclusive use of a business name, symbol or other device or style.
role.label: Trademarks [Member]

role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy for the use of estimates in the preparation of financial statements in conformity with generally accepted accounting principles.
role.label: Use of Estimates

role.documentation: Security that gives the holder the right to purchase shares of stock in accordance with the terms of the instrument, usually upon payment of a specified amount.
role.label: Warrant [Member]

role.documentation: Average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating basic and diluted earnings per share (EPS).
role.label: Weighted average number of shares outstanding
